attributes.action: Legislate on the maximum speed of electric wheelchairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some of these wheelchairs travel at excess speeds approaching 8 to 10 mph.
There is no need for these vehicles to go faster than 4 mph.
They are becoming a nuisance, they often don't have an audible warning device and the first you konw of their present is a nudge on the ankle.
